QuestData.Title: Lost Wardens
QuestData.Description: We held out as long as we could, $c. But the flames... the heat... We lost the whole town.$B$BCaptain Irontree refused to pull back when the flames engulfed us. Our forces are scattered. Maybe some of the others survived? We can mount a counter-attack!$B$BGo into the Scorched Plain and rescue any lost wardens that got separated from the group. Then find Captain Irontree - he's probably taken up a fortified position in the middle of the fighting.
QuestData.RewardText: You've assembled the survivors? Good, good. And the rest of the mountain - healed?$B$BHaha, strike me down! We're on the front lines again!
